question:
Interpol 88th General Assembly will assemble in Santiago, Chile. Consider the following statements in this context:
  1. Interpol is headquartered in Brussels.
  2. Each member country is represented by the diplomats of the respective member states in the Interpol General Assembly.
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: Â Statement 1 is incorrect: Interpol is headquartered in Lyon, France. Interpol or the International Criminal Police Organisation was initially established in the year 1923 as International Criminal Police Commission. It started calling itself Interpol in 1956. India joined the Interpol in 1949. Statement 2 is incorrect: Each member country is represented in the Interpol General Assembly mostly by chiefs of the law enforcing agencies of the respective member countries. Interpol General Assembly is the supreme governing body of the Interpol. It elects the members of the Interpol Executive Committee that is involved in providing guidance and directions between the sessions of the Assembly.
